Each individual coral colony within the simulation grows with a species-specific growth rate, corresponding to the trait combinations, as described above (Table S1). As it has been shown that competition among corals affects growth rates of competitors
63, 64 , the outcome of direct competition between neighbouring coral colonies is determined using a competition index ( CI, similar to Langmead and Sheppard)
65 , which influences directional growth of affected colonies at each model step (see Appendix 1: Method section).
